text: The 7th IPC Ice Sledge Hockey World Championships took place in the SPART Complex in Goyang, South Korea from April 12 - 20, 2013.Goyang 2013 - 2013 IPC Ice Sledge Hockey World Championships A-Pool, 12-20 April It was the first time that South Korea hosted the IPC Ice Sledge Hockey World Championships. In the final, Canada defeated the United States 1-0, to win their third title.Hockey Canada: 2013 IPC World Sledge Ice Hockey Championship Russia defeated the Czech Republic 3-0 for the bronze medal. ==References== World Ice Sledge Hockey Championships - Men's Category:April 2013 events Category:2013 in Asia Category:2010s in South Korea
title: 2013 IPC Ice Sledge Hockey World Championships
